entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-H15: Values 1990. World Values Survey. Hungarian population data. data sheet. Version: 2010-01-04
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István György
entry.dcterms:description: The survey addressed issues of values, attitudes, socio-political and economic attitudes, socio-occupational and demographic structure of the Hungarian society.

survey data
time-series

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
